name: McKinsey Insights - Financial Services
description: Research and insights on banking, insurance, and wealth management transformation, including AI and digital innovation.

name: Deloitte Insights - Banking & Capital Markets
description: Reports and analysis on financial services trends, technology adoption, and regulatory changes.

name: arXiv - Computer Science (AI)
description: Open-access archive of AI research papers, including multi-agent systems, LLMs, and agentic AI.

name: Papers with Code - Machine Learning
description: Machine learning papers, code implementations, and benchmarks including agent-based systems.

name: Hugging Face - AI Research & Models
description: Community-driven AI research papers, models, and datasets with focus on LLMs and agents.

name: Financial Stability Board
description: International body monitoring global financial system, publishing reports on fintech and AI risks.

name: Bank for International Settlements
description: Research on central banking, financial stability, and emerging technologies in finance.

name: MIT Digital Economy
description: Academic research on digital transformation, AI, and automation in business and economy.

name: Gartner Research - AI & Analytics
description: Technology research and advisory on AI, analytics, and enterprise technology adoption.

name: Stanford HAI - Human-Centered AI
description: Research on AI applications, ethics, and societal impact including agentic systems.

name: InsurTech Insights
description: News, analysis, and resources on insurance technology and digital transformation.

name: The Financial Brand
description: Banking trends, digital transformation, and customer experience innovation in financial services.
